name: project_modules
description: Gets all modules of the project.

name: list_directory_contents
description: Gets the content of a directory. By default it returns the content of the current directory.

optional_parameters.name: dirName
optional_parameters.description: Address of a directory to list

name: change_directory
description: Changes the current working directory to a new one.

optional_parameters.name: targetDirName
optional_parameters.description: The address of the directory that will become the working directory. Path should be relative to the current working directory or be the full path.

name: file_text
description: Gets a text of the requested file.

required_parameters.name: fileName
required_parameters.description: The name of the file whose text should be returned.

name: file_functions
description: Gets a list of names of the requested file functions.

required_parameters.name: fileName
required_parameters.description: The name of the file whose functions should be returned.

name: file_function_code
description: Gets a list of names of the requested file functions.

required_parameters.name: fileName
required_parameters.description: The name of the file in which the requested function code is located.

required_parameters.name: functionName
required_parameters.description: The name of the function whose code should be returned.

name: file_classes
description: Gets a list of names of the requested file classes.

required_parameters.name: fileName
required_parameters.description: The name of the file whose classes should be returned.

name: file_class_code
description: Gets a list of names of the requested file classes.

required_parameters.name: fileName
required_parameters.description: The name of the file in which the requested function code is located.

required_parameters.name: className
required_parameters.description: The name of the class whose code should be returned.

name: reverse_last_api_methods
description: Reverses last several api methods that, importantly, have modified the state of the user project. Returns the project to the state it was in before these api methods execution.

optional_parameters.name: apiMethodsCount
optional_parameters.description: A positive integer indicating the number of recent methods that need to be reversed
